Sentence.sentence: But will such contests, which are overwhelmingly dominated by Asian and white students from middle-class and affluent families become any more diverse? Many social and cultural factors play roles in determining which promising students get on the path toward international math recognition.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: a basis for explaining human genetic diversityan aid to understanding different populationsan explanation for social and cultural differencesa term to describe individual human characteristicsmodern genetics research is likely to fuel racial conflictsrace is a poorly defined marker of human genetic diversityrace as a biological term can explain human genetic diversitygenetics research should consider social and cultural variablesit is absolutely necessary to put race aside in making diagnosisit is important to include social variables in genetics researchracial categories for genetic diversity could lead to wrong clinical predictionsdiscrimination against black people may cause negligence in clinical treatmentThey be more precise with the language they use.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: E.B.Du Bois was concerned that race was being used as a  biological explanation for what he understood to be social and cultural differences between different populations  of people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Students are placed in small groups with counselors ( ' , trained seniors on campus); they have access to cultural and ethnic affinity ( ' ,  联 系 ) groups, tutoring centers and also have a summer orientation specifically for first-generation students ( ' , the latter being one of the most common programs for students).
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It's a social and cultural issue, as well as an economic one.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The Home Depot approach to craftsmanship - simplify it, dumb it down, hire a contractor - is one signal that mastering tools and working with one's hands is receding in America as a hobby, as a valued skill, as a cultural influence that shaped thinking and behavior in vast sections of the country
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the teaching was shaped by our cultural imagines.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I specialize in cultural psychology, examining similarities and differences between East Asians and North Americans.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Kwanzaa is a cultural festival during which African- Americans celebrate and reflect upon their rich heritage as the products of two worlds.

Sentence.sentence: Many social and cultural factors play roles in determining which promising students get on the path toward international math recognition.

Sentence.sentence: So we've been looking at other ways of seeing whether this motivation to view oneself positively is shaped by cultural experiences.

Sentence.sentence: They hypothesize that language diversity must be about history cultural differences, mountains or oceans dividing populations.

Sentence.sentence: According to the Dallas area cultural advocacy coalition, arts agencies employ more than 10, 000 people as full-or part-time employees or independent contractors.

Sentence.sentence: As cultural symbols go, the American car is quite young.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Buxton is justifiably proud of its cultural life and you' ll find much to suit all tastes with art, music, opera and the performing arts at Buxton opera house & pavilion arts centre and green man gallery.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Buxton open house & pavilion arts centre is special because it offers artistic and cultural activities.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: In fact, half of the 6, 000-7, 000 languages spoken around the world today will likely die out by the next century, according to the united nations educational, scientific and cultural organization UNESCO.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Living in a glare of our making, we have cut ourselves off from our evolutionary and cultural heritage—the light of the stars and the rhythms of day and night.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Look to many of history's cultural symbols, and there you'll find an ancestor of frosty, the snowman in the movie frozen.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Not only will you help our young volunteers to develop personally, you'll also learn new skills and increase your cultural awareness.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Nurses should recognize their own personal and cultural construction of silence so that a patient's silence is not interrupted too early or allowed to go on unnecessarily.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Persons in other cultural groups value silence and view it as necessary for understanding a person's needs.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Silence may be viewed by some cultural groups as extremely uncomfortable; therefore attempts may be made to fill every gap 间隙 with conversation.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The meaning of silence varies among cultural groups.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: The values of artistic works, according to cultural relativism, are simply reflections of local social and economic conditions.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 阅读理解 阅读E 原文

Sentence.sentence: Unesco united nations educational, scientific and cultural organization recently set April 30 as a day to raise awareness of Jazz music, its significance, and its potential as a unifying voice across cultures.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Some attributed virtually every important cultural achievement to the inventions of a few, especially gifted peoples that, according to diffusionists, then spread to other cultures.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Other anthropologists believed that cultural innovations, such as inventions, had a single origin and passed from society to society.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In fact, all of these cultural developments occurred separately at different times in many parts of the world.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Coinciding with the groundbreaking theory of biological evolution proposed by British naturalist Charles Darwin in the 1860s, British social philosopher Herbert Spencer put forward his own theory of biological and cultural evolution.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: American social scientist Lewis Henry Morgan introduced another theory of cultural evolution in the late 1800s.
Sentence.come: 出自-2009年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To filter out what is unique from what is shared might enable us to understand how complex cultural behavior arose and what guides it in evolutionary or cognitive terms.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Here, Darwinism seems to offer justification for it all humans share common origins it seems reasonable to suppose that cultural diversity could also be traced to more constrained beginnings.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: What are the norms of your environment? What converys status? Who are your most important audiences? How do the people you respect and look up to present themselves? The better you understand the cultural context, the more control you can have over your impact.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Yet science has a cultural history, too, with roots going back to the dawn of civilization.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is no reason why everyone cannot be welcomed on Mauna Kea to embrace their cultural heritage and to study the stars.Robert F.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In effect, fewer federal funds today are going towards the agency's other work—such as forest conservation, watershed and cultural resources management, and infrastructure upkeep—that affect the lives of all Americans.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The better you understand the cultural context, the more control you can have over your impact.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: There is no reason why everyone cannot be welcomed on Mauna Kea to embrace their cultural heritage and to study the stars.

entry.def: Cultural means relating to a particular society and its ideas, customs, and art.

example.ex: ...a deep sense of personal honor which was part of his cultural heritage.
example.tran: 他所继承的文化传统中强烈的个人荣誉感

example.ex: ...the Rajiv Gandhi Foundation which promotes cultural and educational exchanges between Britain and India.
example.tran: 促进英国和印度两国文化和教育交流的拉吉夫·甘地基金会

entry.def: Cultural means involving or concerning the arts.

example.ex: ...the sponsorship of sports and cultural events by tobacco companies.
example.tran: 烟草公司对体育赛事和文化活动的赞助

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to the arts and manners that a group favors;
2. denoting or deriving from or distinctive of the ways of living built up by a group of people;

sentences.sentence: "influenced by ethnic and cultural ties"- J.F.Kennedy

means.word_mean: 3. of or relating to the shared knowledge and values of a society;
4. relating to the raising of plants or animals;

sentences.cn: 这两种社群之间的文化差异
sentences.en: cultural differences between the two communities

sentences.cn: 经济、社会和文化因素
sentences.en: economic, social and cultural factors

sentences.cn: 文化活动
sentences.en: a cultural event

sentences.cn: 欧洲的文化遗产
sentences.en: Europe's cultural heritage

sentences.cn: 管弦乐队对这座城市的文化生活而言非常重要。
sentences.en: The orchestra is very important for the cultural life of the city.

sentences.cn: 他所继承的文化传统中强烈的个人荣誉感
sentences.en: ...a deep sense of personal honor which was part of his cultural heritage.

sentences.cn: 促进英国和印度两国文化和教育交流的拉吉夫·甘地基金会
sentences.en: ...the Rajiv Gandhi Foundation which promotes cultural and educational exchanges between Britain and India.

sentences.cn: 烟草公司对体育赛事和文化活动的赞助
sentences.en: ...the sponsorship of sports and cultural events by tobacco companies.

sentences.cn: 这本新辞典的出版是今年文化界的一件大事.
sentences.en: The publication of the new dictionary is one of the cultural event of the year.

sentences.cn: 它们是我们祖先留下来的最宝贵的文化遗产.
sentences.en: They are the most precious cultural legacy our forefathers left.

sentences.cn: 普及文化科学是头等重要的.
sentences.en: It is of first importance to spread cultural and scientific knowledge among the people.

sentences.cn: 文物按年代顺序展出.
sentences.en: The cultural relics are displayed in chronological sequence.

sentences.cn: 每个国家都有其自身的文化传统.
sentences.en: Each country has its own indigenous cultural tradition.

sentences.cn: 混乱的文化大革命是引起对中国发生变化的极度渴望的主要原因.
sentences.en: The tumultuous Cultural Revolution was chiefly responsible for the searing desire for change in China.

sentences.cn: 他是受过高等教育的人.
sentences.en: He is a man of high cultural background.

sentences.cn: 他曾经随文化代表团到中国来过一次.
sentences.en: He was once on a cultural delegation which came to China.

sentences.cn: 文艺复兴是一个文化上取得空前成就的时代.
sentences.en: The Renaissance was an epoch of unparalleled cultural achievement.

sentences.cn: 我们党鼓励多种文化, 而不是文化分歧.
sentences.en: Our party believes in encouraging cultural diversity, not diversion.

sentences.cn: 我们下周二要举办一个文物展览.
sentences.en: We are going to put on an exhibition of cultural relics next Tuesday.

sentences.cn: 该杂志成为两民族间文化交流的媒介.
sentences.en: The magazine becomes a cultural medium of intercourse between the two peoples.

sentences.cn: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍.
sentences.en: His extensive experience in other parts of Asia helped him to overcome cultural barriers.

sentences.cn: 城北过去很冷落, 现在成了文化区.
sentences.en: The northern part of the city used to be sparsely populated , but has now become a cultural centre.

sentences.cn: 展览馆里陈列着许多出土文物.
sentences.en: Many unearthed cultural relics are set forth in the exhibition hall.

sentences.cn: 我们中国人有伟大的文化遗产.
sentences.en: We Chinese have a great cultural heritage.

sentences.cn: 这部著作不愧为中国新文化运动的丰碑.
sentences.en: This book is a monumental work worthy of China's new cultural movement.

sentences.cn: 两国签订了文化协定.
sentences.en: The two countries signed a cultural agreement.

sentences.cn: 这些人大体上都是 文化大革命 中提起来的,是既得利益的.
sentences.en: Most of them were promoted during the " cultural revolution " and they have their own vested interests.

sentences.cn: 这个镇子是个文化荒原。
sentences.en: The town is a cultural dead zone.

sentences.cn: 西班牙的丰富文化遗产
sentences.en: Spain's rich cultural heritage

sentences.cn: 英国人的文化特点
sentences.en: the cultural peculiarities of the English

sentences.cn: 事实上，所有这些文化的发展是在世界各地的不同时期分别出现的。
sentences.en: In fact, all of these cultural developments occurred separately at different times in many parts of the world.

sentences.cn: 民意调查只反映了社会文化的神话但它们不能反映事实.
sentences.en: Polling results like this reflect our culture ( cultural ) mythology but they don't reflect the facts.

sentences.cn: 神道石柱与碑碣同样确为我国固有之 物 ,但并不否认之后受其外来文化的影响,南朝带翼神兽源流关系通过具体形象进一步明晰.
sentences.en: Similarly a great many foreign cultural influences are obvious, as well.

sentences.cn: 难道这里面没有文化的差别的因素在 吗 ?
sentences.en: Stewart : Are there cultural differences that come into play?

sentences.cn: 我想知道这是否是因为文化的原因.
sentences.en: I wondered if it was a cultural thing.

sentences.cn: 作为文化遗产, 是“黄山文化”的发祥地.
sentences.en: As a site of cultural heritage, the mountain is the cradle of Mount Huangshan Civilization.

sentences.cn: 思想文化的发展水平必定建立在经济基础之上.
sentences.en: Ideological and cultural level of development must be based on the economic base.

sentences.cn: 这是一个有文化的地方?
sentences.en: Is this a cultural place?

sentences.cn: 通过丹溪医学,能清晰地感受到元代经济文化交流的历史气息,其背后折射出来的是社会文化的内涵.
sentences.en: Danxi medicine reflects distinctly the economic and cultural communication and social culture the Yuan Dynasty.

sentences.cn: 在翻译过程中, 文化差异会影响语言和文化的传递.
sentences.en: In translating process, cultural differences interfere with the transference of language and culture.

sentences.cn: 当然,由于语言文化的差异意象的调整有时候是必要的.
sentences.en: The adjustment of images is and necessary sometimes due to linguistic and cultural reasons.

sentences.cn: 校内有各种不同文化的活动及各式运动可供参加.
sentences.en: Many cultural activities and varsity and intramural sports.

sentences.cn: 文化的发展向许多人提出太多的要求.
sentences.en: The cultural advance has asked too much of many men.

sentences.cn: 中译本见《文化的解释》, 纳日碧力戈 等译, 上海人民出版社,1999年, 第103页.
sentences.en: Peter Burke , What is Cultural History ? Cambridge : Polity Press, 2004, p . 195.

sentences.cn: 我们应该对美国文化的多样性有一个全面的了解.
sentences.en: We should get a thorough understanding about the cultural diversity of the United States.

sentences.cn: 服饰是一个社会 、 一个阶层的思想和文化的反映.
sentences.en: The clothing is a social, a social stratum thought and the cultural reflection.

sentences.cn: 其原因有历史的 、 文化的 、 习俗的,也有文学名著的影响, 还有大思想家、文学家等对后世的影响.
sentences.en: The reasons may be historical, cultural, habitual, or of the influence of masterpieces and great scholars.

sentences.cn: 所以, 对推类的理解与说明,应是文化的诠释.
sentences.en: Therefore, the understanding and explanation about inference should be a cultural interpretation.

sentences.cn: 没有文化的多样化, 不可能形成生态环境的良性循环.
sentences.en: No cultural diversification, there is no good cycle of environment.

sentences.cn: 摘要中西文化的差异导致了文化的不可译性.
sentences.en: Cultural dissimilarities have made culture untranslatable.

sentences.cn: 城市是一个地区人口最集中的区域, 是政治 、 经济 、 文化的中心.

sentences.cn: 中国人的优越感源自生物的 、 文化的因素, 以及观念和信仰.

sentences.cn: 城市作为政治、经济 、 文化的中心,在社会发展中起着主导作用.

sentences.cn: 文化的差异性为语言学习带来了困难.

sentences.cn: 中国扇文化有着深厚的文化底蕴, 是民族文化的一个集成部分.
sentences.en: Chinese fan culture has a rich cultural heritage, which is an integrated part of national culture.

sentences.cn: 商品既具有“物”的价值,又蕴涵“文化”的价值.

sentences.cn: 文化的落后需要长时间才能赶上.
sentences.en: It takes a lot of time to catch up with a cultural lag.
